keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.GAssist

Class Classifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • keel.Algorithms.Genetic_Rule_Learning.GAssist.Classifier
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassifierADI, ClassifierGABIL, ClassifierUBR

    public abstract class Classifier
extends java.lang.Object

    Base class for all classifiers (knowledge representations)

    Since:
    JDK1.2

    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by Jaume Bacardit (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 28/03/2004, Modified by Xavi Solé (La Salle, Ramón Llull University - Barcelona) 23/12/2008

      • compareToIndividual

        public boolean compareToIndividual(Classifier ind)
        This function returns true if this individual is better than the the individual passed as a parameter. This comparison can be based on accuracy or a combination of accuracy and size
